frontmatter.title: Ryan Strobel, DVM.
frontmatter.testimonialIntro: Consulting veterinarian puts Tonisity Px to the test.
frontmatter.jobTitle: Swine Vet Center, St. Peter, MN

node.html: "We needed to stabilize production at a sow farm and were looking for ways to save pigs by lowering pre-weaning mortality. Litters that received Tonisity Px clearly out-performed those that didn’t, by weaning more pigs, having lower mortality rates. This was a large comparison of nearly 1,500 litters and 20,000 pigs, giving the producer high confidence in results.”

“We tested the 5-day program of PxW for pigs weaned into a wean-to-finish barn in Iowa. The Tonisity PxW pigs consumed almost 3x the water in 5 days as compared to the control group.  We were delighted with how the pigs started and look forward to using PxW on future weaned pigs. ”
